changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.relationship_attribute AS SELECT ra.id, r.name AS relationship, a.name AS attribute, ra.key AS key, ra.numeric_value, ra.integer_value, ra.boolean_value, ra.text_value, u.name AS unit, ra.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ra.update_date FROM relationship_attribute ra JOIN relationship r ON ra.relationship = r.id JOIN attribute a ON ra.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON ra.unit = u.id JOIN agency up ON ra.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.relationship_attribute OWNER TO core;
